00038 int pciVendor::store_db (void)
00039 {
00040   std::vector<pciDevice*>::iterator iter_dev;
00041   std::vector<pciSubsystem*>::iterator iter_subsys;
00042 
00043   pciDevice* tmp_dev;
00044   pciSubsystem* tmp_subsys;
00045 
00046   const string host_url("localhost");
00047   const string user("root");
00048   const string pass("password");
00049   const string database("harix_db");
00050   string vendor_code, vendor_name, device_code, device_name, subsys_vdr, subsys_dev, subsys_name, tmp_name;
00051   const string quote = "\"";
00052   string::size_type qpos;
00053 
00054   // Could be better with MySQL Prepared Statement
00055   // but it's buggy operating with Stored Procedures at the moment
00056   
00057   try{
00058     sql::Driver* driver = get_driver_instance();
00059     std::auto_ptr<sql::Connection> connector( driver->connect(host_url, user, pass) );
00060 #ifdef DEBUG
00061     connector->setClientOption("clientTrace", &on_off);
00062 #endif
00063     connector->setSchema(database);
00064     std::auto_ptr<sql::Statement> stmt(connector->createStatement());
00065 
00066     vendor_code = "\"" + get_code() + "\"" ;
00067     tmp_name = get_name();
00068     qpos = tmp_name.find(quote);
00069     if ( qpos != string::npos )
00070       correct_quotes(tmp_name,qpos,quote);
00071 
00072     vendor_name = "\"" + tmp_name + "\"";
00073     // std::cout << vendor_code << " - " << vendor_name << std::endl;                       // @test
00074     stmt->execute("CALL sp_pci_VendorsAdd("+ vendor_code + "," + vendor_name + ")");
00075     throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00076 
00077     if ( kid_list.size() == 0 ){
00078       // Add an entry in pci_devices for vendors without any device listed
00079       device_code = "\"XXXX\"";
00080       device_name = "null";
00081       // std::cout << '\t' << device_code << " - " << device_name << std::endl;         // @test
00082       stmt->execute("CALL sp_pci_DevicesAdd("+ vendor_code + "," + device_code + "," + device_name + ")");
00083       throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00084       // Add an entry in pci_subsystems for vendors without any device listed
00085       subsys_vdr =  "null" ;
00086       subsys_dev =  "null" ;
00087       subsys_name =  "null" ;
00088       stmt->execute("CALL sp_pci_SubsystemsAdd(" + vendor_code + "," + device_code + "," + subsys_vdr + "," + subsys_dev + "," + subsys_name + ")");
00089       throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00090       // std::cout << '\t' << '\t' << subsys_vdr << " " << subsys_dev << "-" << subsys_name << std::endl;//@test
00091 
00092     }
00093     else {
00094       for( iter_dev = kid_list.begin(); iter_dev != kid_list.end(); ++iter_dev ){
00095         tmp_dev = *iter_dev;
00096         device_code = "\"" + tmp_dev->get_code() + "\"" ;
00097         tmp_name = tmp_dev->get_name();
00098         qpos = tmp_name.find(quote);
00099         if ( qpos != string::npos )
00100           correct_quotes(tmp_name,qpos,quote);
00101 
00102         device_name = "\"" + tmp_name + "\"";
00103         // std::cout << '\t' << device_code << " - " << device_name << std::endl;       // @test
00104         stmt->execute("CALL sp_pci_DevicesAdd("+ vendor_code + "," + device_code + "," + device_name + ")");
00105         throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00106 
00107         if( (tmp_dev->subsystem_list).size() == 0  ){
00108           subsys_vdr =  "null" ;
00109           subsys_dev =  "null" ;
00110           subsys_name =  "null" ;
00111           stmt->execute("CALL sp_pci_SubsystemsAdd(" + vendor_code + "," + device_code + "," + subsys_vdr + "," + subsys_dev + "," + subsys_name + ")");
00112           throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00113           // std::cout << '\t' << '\t' << subsys_vdr << " " << subsys_dev << "-" << subsys_name << std::endl;//@test
00114           continue;
00115         }
00116         for( iter_subsys = (tmp_dev->subsystem_list).begin(); iter_subsys != (tmp_dev->subsystem_list).end();
00117              ++iter_subsys ){
00118           tmp_subsys = *iter_subsys;
00119           subsys_vdr =  "\"" + tmp_subsys->get_subVendor() + "\"" ;
00120           subsys_dev =  "\"" + tmp_subsys->get_subDevice() + "\"" ;
00121           tmp_name = tmp_subsys->get_name();
00122           qpos = tmp_name.find(quote);
00123           if ( qpos != string::npos )
00124             correct_quotes(tmp_name,qpos,quote);
00125 
00126           subsys_name =  "\"" + tmp_name + "\"" ;
00127           // std::cout << '\t' << '\t' << subsys_vdr << " " << subsys_dev << "-" << subsys_name << std::endl;//@test
00128           stmt->execute("CALL sp_pci_SubsystemsAdd("+ vendor_code + "," + device_code + "," + subsys_vdr + "," + subsys_dev + "," + subsys_name + ")");
00129           throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00130 
00131         }
00132       }
00133     }
00134   }
00135   catch (sql::SQLException &e) {
00136     /*
00137       The MySQL Connector/C++ throws three different exceptions:
00138       - sql::MethodNotImplementedException (derived from sql::SQLException)
00139       - sql::InvalidArgumentException (derived from sql::SQLException)
00140       - sql::SQLException (derived from std::runtime_error)
00141     */
00142     std::cout << "# ERR: SQLException in " << __FILE__;
00143     std::cout << "(" << __FUNCTION__ << ") on line " << __LINE__ << std::endl;
00144     /* Use what() (derived from std::runtime_error) to fetch the error message */
00145     std::cout << "# ERR: " << e.what();
00146     std::cout << " (MySQL error code: " << e.getErrorCode();
00147     std::cout << ", SQLState: " << e.getSQLState() << " )" << std::endl;
00148     return 1;
00149 
00150   }
00151 
00152   return 0;
00153 }
00154 
00155 static void correct_quotes(string& tmp_str, string::size_type& qpos, const string& quote)
00156 {
00157   do{
00158     tmp_str.replace(qpos, quote.size(), "\\\"" );
00159     qpos = tmp_str.find(quote, qpos+2);
00160   }while(qpos != string::npos);
00161 }
00162 
00163 
00164 // Throw the unneeded result returned from the SP CALL
00165 static void throw_call_garbage(sql::Statement* normal_stmt)
00166 {
00167   std::auto_ptr< sql::ResultSet > res;
00168   do {
00169     res.reset(normal_stmt->getResultSet());
00170     while (res->next()) {
00171 #ifdef DEBUG
00172       std::cout << res->getInt(1) << " -> expected value is 0" << std::endl;
00173 #endif
00174     }
00175   } while (normal_stmt->getMoreResults());
00176 }

00179 pciVendor::~pciVendor()
00180 {
00181   int device_list_size = kid_list.size();
00182 
00183   for ( int k=0; k < device_list_size; k++ ){
00184     delete kid_list.back();
00185     kid_list.pop_back();
00186   }
00187 
00188 }

00190 pciDevice::~pciDevice()
00191 {
00192   int subsystem_list_size = subsystem_list.size();
00193 
00194   for (int k=0; k < subsystem_list_size; k++){
00195     delete subsystem_list.back();
00196     subsystem_list.pop_back();
00197   }
00198 }
